filters.name: tasks-due-today
filters.value: fq=dueDate_tdt:[NOW/DAY TO NOW/DAY%2B1DAY] AND -status_lcs:COMPLETE AND -status_lcs:DELETE AND -status_lcs:CLOSED

filters.name: my-tasks-due-today
filters.value: fq=dueDate_tdt:[NOW/DAY TO NOW/DAY%2B1DAY] AND -status_lcs:COMPLETE AND -status_lcs:DELETE AND -status_lcs:CLOSED AND assignee_id_lcs:${user}

filters.name: tasks-overdue
filters.value: fq=dueDate_tdt:[* TO NOW/DAY] AND -status_lcs:COMPLETE AND -status_lcs:DELETE AND -status_lcs:CLOSED

filters.name: my-tasks-overdue
filters.value: fq=dueDate_tdt:[* TO NOW/DAY] AND -status_lcs:COMPLETE AND -status_lcs:DELETE AND -status_lcs:CLOSED AND assignee_id_lcs:${user}
